product_name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry Touch Sunblock SPF 50+ Sunscreen For Women And Men, 30ml
review: I have read many reviews of this product who say that they have received expired product. I want to clarify it. The date written on the FRONT SIDE CRIMP of the tube is not the expiry date but the MANUFACTURED DATE. The expiry date and batch number are written on the back side crimp of the tube. Please check properly before giving negative feedback as it can hamper the reputation of the seller.

product_name: RE' EQUIL Oxybenzone and OMC Free Sunscreen For Oily, Sensitive & Acne Prone Skin, SPF 50 PA+++ - 50g
review: This is one of the best sunscreens I've ever used on me. The quality and packaging is top notch. Has a light, fluid texture that absorbs instantly. No white cast. I'm a dude, 25, and i have super sensitive skin that reacts to pretty much everything and finding the right sunscreen is incredibly hard. Thank goodness i took the plunge with this one! No irritation whatsoever and my skin looked bright and healthy at the end of the day which is amazing since most sunscreens tend to make you look dull afterwards. This has the feel of typical European sunscreens that i have used in the past like avene, la roche and vichy etc MINUS the exorbitant price! The product has a scent that is mild and not too bothersome. Seriously, go ahead. Thank me later. Or not, it's upto you.

But I'll try once my skin calms down again.Edit: It's been more than 3 months and I haven't used it once, I feel like I'm gonna breakout if I use it.

review: This is a decent sunscreen which protects your skin well from the sun. However, in humid summer months it gets too oily and makes you sweat a lot. The cream will eventually get washed with sweat and will make you feel worse. Suitable for dry summer and winter months but if you stay in a humid region or sweat too much then don't go for this. Also, the smell is a bit weird and doesn't have a good scent at all.

product_name: RE' EQUIL Oxybenzone and OMC Free Sunscreen For Oily, Sensitive & Acne Prone Skin, SPF 50 PA+++ - 50g
review: I'm using Re'equil Oxybenzone & OMC Free Sunscreen from almost 2 weeks and I'm loving it. This is non-sticky, non-oily, non-greasy and non-irritant. It works really well,make skin feel soft, and best for sensitive, oily and acne prone skin.It works as it claims. It is light wear, gives 6 hours protection, gives matte finish and don't get absorbed in the skin. It has advanced UVA+UVB filters with PA+++ protection and SPF 50. It is dermatology tested and you can use it after cleaning your face, neck and any other sun exposed areas. Just a little amount is enough for good protection.This product is a must try.

review: The sunscreen was supposed  to be  great . I did a lot of research before buying this..as it is non comodogenic so it wont clog your pores and cause breakouts..this sunscreen leaves a terrible white cast on..you'll have to spend a great amt of time rubbing and tugging your  skin to spread it all over skin  ..hello early signs of ageing !!!  ...which  is something you literally are trying to avoid when getting a sunscreen..im dusky skinned..and it leaves a terrible white cast on..and if you're fair skinned and you think it would'nt matter..here's another drawback..the cream literally starts forming rubbery particles as you try to layer it around your face.....{like the dead skin that comes of your skin..except its white ..} so as much as you try to apply this around it will flake off...c'mon ponds like can you have one average product..just one????.and another thing is  is how small it is..they should mention that the product is sample size as its just way too small

product_name: POND'S SPF 50 Sun Protect Non-Oily Sunscreen, 35 g

To protect my skin from sun i must have to wear sunscreen on regular basis with minimal skincare.But i was confused that what should I buy. Then I found POND'S SPF 50 Sun Protect Non-Oily Sunscreen. Which is perfect for my skin & regular wear during my office hours. It also gives little cooling effect on face which is great. Its not completely non oily but its less oily than biotique sunscreens. The fragrance of the sunscreen is very good. Love it.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Glow Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: The product packaging is totally unacceptable. Literally put on a large box without any wrapping on the nozzle. The cap was not locked, don't know if it's having the 400ml as it seems to be a opened bottle.Vaseline cocoa butter is an excellent non greasy body lotion with good scent but the way Amazon shipped the bottle really disappointed.4 star given for the brand trust.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Glow Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: It smells good, definitely not greasy.Stays moisturised for a long time after bath.I use this body lotion for winter season. This holds the moisture. And got at a great discounted price.Product is nice best and most affordable moisturizer and thank you Amazon delivery was fastGood product from vasline, its smells great and a good moisturizing lotion for all age group. Go for it.I have a dry skin and this works great on them.The odour is also pleasant and comparatively with nivea this is somewhat thick and non greeasy!Using it since a year.I really liked the chocolaty smell of this moisturizer really great and very good for skin and the discount here is amazing.It was amazing deal.I got 50 % discount.Very Smooth cream bash lotion.Delivered very fast befor time.Happy to got this. Its original product if you want to check please scan barcode given on bottle..if you are looking for best winter body lotion on Amazon then Cocoa glow is best choice fit in budget and quite impressive..thanks to Amazon for delivering within two days and well protective covering.Thanks. Please click on helpful bar if you find my review helpful..stay blessed..see image which I have attached.Vaseline Intensive care cocoa glow lotion is best suited for dry skin in winter. It's light and non-greasy and gets absorbed within a few seconds. It as a strong chocolate fragrance and while applying everybody in the house will know about it due to the strong scent. The fragrance is more like liquid dairy milk chocolate.If you have extreme dry skin, please go for Vaseline Intensive care Advanced Reapair (white bottle) lotion or Nivea body milk (navy blue bottle) which is meant to repair extreme dry skin. Oh!! Doesn't matter how many body lotion i use, this will stand out all of them.Maybe the main reason it's delicious scent. Couldn't have been better.Moisturisation, outstanding, grease-free and the best part is longetivity. I just have to apply every morning after bath and I'm done. No need to reapply. Last until I get back to my bed. (Sometimes not that long, but it's okay). I just don't have to use more than 6 pumps for my whole body. So, thumbs up for this packaging.And at end of review, i would thank amazon for good packaging and delivery.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Glow Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: I'm a regular customer of Vaseline products and this one lists on my go to moisturizer in winters. It's thick but not oily. Moisturizes and nourishes the skin well. Not suited for face if one has oily skin. Scent is heavy but I like this particular fragrance of cocoa and shea butter, so it depends on personal preference. Good packaging too. Lasts from morning to evening/night.

review: I found it very good moisturizer. A comparison may be more helpful:-Moisturizing power:Coconut oil>Jac Olivol>Keokarpin body oil>Vaseline intensive care>Parachute deep nourish (Parachute deep nourish can moisturize mild dry skin for a day)-Stickiness:Parachute deep nourish<Vaseline intensive care<Keokarpin body oil<Jac Olivol<Coconut oil (Parachute deep care instantaneously gets absorbed in skin)-Fragrence:Parachute deep nourish>Jac Olivol>Keokarpin body oil>Coconut oil>Vaseline intensive care (Parachute deep nourish has good but intense smell, Smell of Keokarpin body oil is pleasant, personally I don't like the smell of Jac Olivol)Thickness:Vaseline intensive care (Lotion)>Parachute deep nourish(Lotion)>Coconut oil>Jac Olivol(Oil)=Keokarpin body oil-Ease of application:Parachute deep nourish>Vaseline intensive care>Keokarpin body oil=Jac Olivol>Coconut oil-Required amount:Coconut oil<Keokarpin body oil<Jac Olivol<Vaseline intensive care<Parachute deep nourish (Good amount of Parachute deep nourish is required, so it will get finished fast.)

review: This is an amazing moisturiser. You can purchase this product from @amazondotinI have an oily skin and this moisturiser is meant for oily skin as it claims to give you an oil free and mattifying finish. So here is my review. This product is priced at ‚Çπ599 for 100ml of the product. I find it a little pricey, And not an affordable moisturiser. It has a shelf life of 2 years and is pretty decent. It does not have any sort of noticeable fragrance. It is formulated without any harmful chemicals. The packaging is sturdy and travel friendly. The texture is nor too thick nor too runny. Now coming to my experience, it is a good moisturiser and keeps your skin moisturised really well. As it is winters my skin still feels a bit oily. This moisturiser did not give me any mattifying finish. Nor it is oil free. It makes my skin feel really moisturised and does add a glow and shine to the skin. After 2-3 hours my skin feels too much moisturised, hydrated, oily and glowy that I need to use a blotting paper. I have tried and tested this product for more than 12 days. It is a good moisturiser. If I ignore the claims then this moisturiser is good for all skin types, but if I consider the ‚Äúoily skin part‚Äù it is definitely not for oily skinned people. product_name: NIVEA Hand Cream, Soothing Glycerin & Olive, 75ml
review: I am a hand cream hoarder and i have tried hand creams from every price range and I can safely add this one to my top 5 handcreams. Just to tell you a bit about my preference in creams, I have sweaty palms and when I apply handcreams it gets a lot worse, so I look for crems that are hydrating and non greas. Due to a lot of hand washing my hands feel very dry and I go over hand creams like water. So I was looking for a affordable and better quality hand cream and thought of ordering this one. This hand cream has a perfect consistency it's not too runny and not too thick either. Comes in a tube packaging which I prefer because that very hygiene. It has mild but pleasent fragrance that lingers for hours and it's not too overpowering for fragrance sensitive people. The cream gets absorbed into your hands quickly and you need just a bit of it. If you have extremely dry hands you might need bit more than usual quantity as its very light cream for that matter. You get 75 ml of crems for 90 rupees which is a very great price for the quantity and compared to other brands its very very reasonable. This lasts me a month or so with all my excessive washing but it depends on your personal usage totally. Its manufactured in Germany. You can look at ingredients list in the pics I've attached.Overall i'd repurchase this product again for sure. Very resonable and effective.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Fresh Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: I have dry skin that needs moisturizer  at all seasons.Even in summer,the AC dehydrates the skin so much that my dry skin is getting scaly with dryness like in winterüò≥ I needed a very good moisturizer coz my baby's Himalayan baby lotion is so light that it has no affect on my dry adult skin!So I ordered this as I vaguely remember using it once and liking it's fragrance.( I usually order Vaseline lotions for my mom whose fragrances I didn't like much).I received this and it's fragrance didn't disappoint. It's mild and lovely.As for it's moisturizing property,it's working nicely on my dry skin. My skin feels and looks lot better now. But the real litmus test will be in winter,when my very dry skin will tell how good this really is!The ingredients in this lotion includes Tapioca starch; the ingredient used in moisturizers that gives it's non greasy effect. So this lotion really does have a non greasy feeling.I bought this for a deal price of Rs.211. well worth it.Shelf life also very good,expiring in 2021.But I'm giving 4 stars as my initial impression was not good because I received a broken pump,I didn't find the broken part in the package which means it was packed broken and not a transit damage.

review: Winters are here and so is the season of dry skin and chapped lips.Moisturising your skin is most essential during winters to prevent ageing and uneven skin tones. I ordered it because the packaging was vintage ( I love vintagggeeee).The biggest advantages about this product:* easy to incorporate in your day to day skin care. If you have to apply the original aloe from the leaves, it will take some time to cut, wash, peel the leaves. It might not be the best idea for your busy schedule.* It is not oily at all* Made from natural product. Does not contain any chemicals or toxic substances* Has a very nice aroma.I am presenting to you some of the ways, I love to use aloe gel in my day to day routine. Hope you like it too.Aloe gel has Vitamin E which acts as an antioxidant and a natural nutrient for your skin.* Over the night moisturiser: Apply a teaspoonful of gel on your face and massage thoroughly. Leave it overnight to get a soft skin in the morning.* Morning moisturiser: After washing your face, use aloe gel to soothe your skin and before going out. This protects the delicate skin from the harsh sunrays, pollution and dry air.* Body lotion: You can use it to apply on your hands and legs in general as a good moisturiser.* Hair mask: Mix it with a little amount of curd and prepare a paste. Apply it on your hair from roots to tips. Leave it for 1 hour and then wash it usually. This conditions and strengthens your hair. Alternately you can also apply the raw aloe gel to avail the same benefits. Do this once every 2 weeks.So these are some of the ways, I like to use Aloe gel in my routine. If you guys have some novel ways, do let me know. I would love to try that.And thats the end of it! Hope you enjoyed it! It's really good. Like the formulation is very light and keeps the skin hydrated. And in the morning the skin feels extremely soft. You just need a small amount and even after using it for 2 months  almost everyday, more than half is remaining. I'm quite happy with the product. And I'll reuse it obviously. My sister has dry skin and she is using the same cream since last 3 months too. Its perfectly suiting her skin too. So i am sure its gonna work for many skin types. Best part is that its affordable and lasts a decent amount of time. And on amazon you can easliy get it on discount. Try it if your looking for an affordable hydrating moisturiser.

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: "I have been using Nivea products for quite a while now.  And not only me, but my mum and sister also insist on using Nivea products.When I saw this product from Nivea, I knew I had to try it. Now I've been using this moisturizer for a week, and I can really see a difference in my skin. It has everything I want in a moisturizer. I like this product as the cream is gentle on the skin and does not have any side effects. It is so soft on my skin and light in texture as well. It doesn't make my skin oily or oleaginous. It also has a pleasant smell. It helped me a lot, it brings out a certain glow in my skin and helped in lighting. I also found that it has some antiseptic properties as it helped in healing some of the small allergies. It is cost effective too. It is worth the money and can be used in daily life too. You can use it as a base for your daily makeup. It is suitable for all skin types and I would recommend everyone to give this product a try.

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: "The name BERRY BLOSSOM is so interesting, that I had to try out this product. Also can't deny the fact that Nivea is best when it comes to their lotions and moisturizers.It's current limited edition range consists of 3 moisturizers, out of which one is Berry blossom. I personally love berries as a fragrance when it comes to skin care products.The product consists of jojoba oil and vitamin E, both of which helps in soothing dry skin.¬†Jojoba oil¬†has anti-inflammatory properties which help to reduce redness caused by drying, ease the effects of it and keep¬†skin¬†calm and comfortable. The Vitamin E and B-complex vitamins in the¬†Jojoba oils¬†help in¬†skin¬†repair and damage control.Also the packaging is very cute and it's comes in a very easy to apply pack.Reasons to buy Berry blossom -1. It's very light weight and not sticky.2. Keeps the skin fresh and has very good fragrance.3. The creamy texture of the moisturizer is very quick absorbent.4. Suitable for all skin types. "

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: The packaging of Nivea Berry Blossom moisturizer is pretty and travel-friendly. It comes with all the information on the product. The consistency of the product is not runny as compared to any other moisturizer available in the market. The formula of Nivea berry blossom is amazing. It is non-oily and non-greasy and easily gets absorbed in the skin. I have oily skin so it works magically it does not look oily at all. The formula stays on the skin for hours and hours and makes skin extremely soft and healthy. I don't have to keep re-applying it every few hours. It keeps my skin fresh and the fragrance is exactly like berries and it's not too strong so obviously won't irritate throughout the day. I absolutely love the fragrance. It is enriched with jojoba oil and vitamin E so it works well when it comes to hydration and skin repair. The texture of the product is light and soft. I found it perfect for all the seasons, especially for summer.According to me, it is one of the best moisturizers available in India. It is easily available online and offline so no need to worry about it. I would highly recommend it to everyone. Even men can use it. My brother uses it on a daily basis and he absolutely loved it.

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: "I have recently purchased the Nivea Berry Blossom moisturizer and I have to say that this product is, so far the best one I've used. I have dry skin and the moisturizer works wonders for my skin making it smooth, soft and the fragrance of fresh berries is very pleasing and refreshing especially during this humid summer. The jojoba oil and Vitamin E has all the goodness that skin requires. I absolutely love the texture. It keeps my skin hydrated. The smell and absorptivity of the product is really good. It's really delicate on the skin and helps in retaining moisture for a longer time (another boon). Its value for money and easy to use. I have tried many brands but this tops everything :) It comes in a cute pink tub and the design is quite impressive. I would recommend this product to everyone and I'm definitely giving it a 5/5."

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: NIVEA creams have always been amazing products that I would recommend to most people because I am a part of this family since childhood. However, this newly launched NIVEA Soft Light Moisturizer Berry Blossom is an amazing moisturizer for the whole family.It keeps my face, neck, and hands moisturized for an entire day, and leaves them soft. Additionally, it has a nice and fresh berries scent that I find exciting. It comes handy and since it is available in compact size as well, it is easier to carry it in your purse while traveling. Adding more, I just want to say it's non-greasy formula is like a cherry on the cake. It feels super light, fresh and non-oily throughout the day. Nivea has never disappointed me. It suits my skin really well and for people like me who don't like an extremely strong scent, it has a soothing appeal.I am just in love with NIVEA's another set of innovations

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: "I have always loved *Nivea Soft Light* and now that it's available in different fragrances, it is like a dream come true.To try out, first I ordered the Berry Blossom moisturizer, it comes in such a cute print saying ""Get party ready with berry blossom"".It is enriched with Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E which makes the skin look healthier and better. And the best part is, it is not greasy so you can apply it with no worries. Moisturising is such an important part of skin care routine but we tend to skip it because of stickiness it leaves on the skin, but Nivea Soft is nonsticky and so smooth on the skin.Also, it is dermatologically tested so it's safe for our skin.Fragrance Alert ::: You can't get over its fragrance soo berry, soo fruity, I feel so refreshing.Ordering the other fragrances Tropical Fruit, Chilled Mint soon!"

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: "It‚Äôs getting warmer, and that means no need to slather the skin with heavy body lotions. I was looking for something very light for everyday use and I came across the new¬†limited collection of Nivea moisturizer. I have so many products from Nivea and I love this brand. I have come to the point that I just trust this brand a lot. I feel their products are a great¬†buy. They are worth the money and deliver what they claim. The product comes in a 100ml packaging which makes it¬†perfect for travel. It does not take too much space.The consistency of the product is medium thick and is extremely creamy. The fragrance is extremely pleasant. Berry Blossom happens to be one of the mildest sweetest fragrances I have ever tried, and the body lotion smells like that. If you are a fan of¬†Berry Blossom, then you will love it. The fragrance is not very sweet like girly ones, and hence, would suit a woman perfectly. The lotion contains extracts of Berry Blossom and¬†Jojoba Oil¬†and also lots of other essential oils. The list of ingredients looks pretty impressive. My skin is quite dry and sensitive but it tends not to get dry during summers. Hence, this lotion is sufficient for my normally dry skin. I apply it only once and the skin feels reliven. Overall, I am satisfied with this product and the results are pretty good."

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: It has been a week since I‚Äôve been using the Nivea Berry Blossom moisturizer and I am pleasantly surprised. Initially, I thought the product was going to be greasy and was meant to be used during the harsh winters but that is not the case. The Nivea Berry Blossom moisturizer is made with Vitamin E and Jojoba oil which makes it super light and non-greasy. The berry extracts give it a pleasant smell and leave the skin feeling fresh for quite a long time. It is especially good for people on the go who do not devote much time to their skincare. This does not take much time to apply. Only a small coin sized amount of this product goes a long way. It is quick absorbing and has a light texture. It does not melt off the face during the heat which makes it perfect for the summers. Unlike the other thousands of moisturizers available in the market today this one is suitable for all skin types to be it oily or dry. After using it for a week I can tell the difference in my skin already. My skin has gotten softer, smoother and much brighter. I feel fresh. As far as makeup is concerned I feel like this would act as a perfect base or primer for any makeup look. Because of its light and non-greasy texture, any kind of foundation can be applied to it without having to fear that it is going to melt or clump up with the foundation. For the many benefits that this product is presenting us with the price is very affordable. 100ml for only Rs 160 is a bargain. Everyone can finally afford great skin without having to think about the dent that‚Äôs going occur in their pockets.

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: As a girl suffering from a lot of acne, I was prescribed drugs and ointments that left my skin super dry. I have tried a variety of moisturizers from different brands but none of them gave me that satisfaction. After using Nivea Berry Blossom Moisturizer, my skin was super soft and had that bounce back again.I've been using it for a long time now and it always gives me a kind of satisfaction. It contains essential oils and vitamins that keep the skin hydrated and locks the moisture in. It is super compact and can fit in your travel pouch so you can carry it anywhere easily.You can also use it before applying makeup as when you are using a matte foundation or lipstick your skin dries up too fast and to avoid those cracks this is the best thing to apply before applying makeup. It is a super budget-friendly product and totally worth it for you to use.

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: "I am the kind of person who never trusts any skin care product easily but Nivea Berry Blossom Moisturizer made my life so much better.  It keeps my skin hydrated and smooth. Definitely my new favorite lotion. Actually, the fact is that I have a skin that is really hard to handle. I have an acne prone skin and was genuinely upset due to this fact but then this product proves as a miracle to me. It has a light effect on my skin.  This is completely the best product that I have ever used.This lotion (and especially this scent) is a staple on my bedside table. It smells amazing. The light smell of the moisturizer rejuvenates the skin, while Vitamin E and jojoba oil make my skin look fresh, soft and smooth. I would recommend this moisturizer and I'm pretty sure you won't be disappointed after using it.

product_name: NIVEA Soft, Light Moisturising Cream, Berry Blossom, 100ml
review: I am using Nivea moisturizer for a long time, and when I first ordered theirlimited edition product - Berry Blossom, I was impressed by it, the moment itarrived. It is compact and pocket-friendly. I also use it as a moisturizer basebefore makeup, and it really helps to blend the foundation smoothly.And the fragrance is also pleasant and not too overpowering. It is not toosweet and nor too mild. And it also has a smooth texture on the skin. It doesn'tmake my skin look too glossy. It is worth the money; the quantity as well thequality is amazing.It is worth the buy and definitely my go-to moisturizer. I can't wait to try theother 2 scents of this product.

product_name: Himalaya Clear Complexion Day Cream, 50g
review: I have been using this cream for 3 years and it has fetched wonderful results for me. I have dry skin. So, after cleansing and toning my face, I use a bit of moisturizer on my face, especially to keep the areas around my eyes, nose and chin hydrated. And then, I put this cream and leave it on. product_name: Olay Moisturising Cream, 50g
review: So I was looking for a regular moisturizing cream. Not an anti aging one, not a fairness one... Not an anything extraordinary one.Just a simple nourishing moisturizing cream.This is exactly that. It's not overly oily, and absorbs easily into the skin.Now, to address a lot of other reviews here. You'll see quite a few reviews where people claim they got pre used containers. These people are obviously not used to buying beauty products online, or traveling. It's logical really. If you travel with a tub of cream, or get it shipped, it moves around a lot and so spreads all over the container and its lid, usually leaving a gap in the middle of the container. Look at the photos I've put up - that's exactly what happened to mine too. Happens which every tub of cream I buy online. Trust me, I know, coz I buy ALL my stuff online. So chill. You're getting a good product. Do buy.

product_name: RE' EQUIL Skin Radiance Cream that helps in reducing hyper pigmentation, dark spots, age spots, melasma - 30g
review: 'Re'equil¬Æ Skin Radiance Cream' is one of the very few skincare products around which genuinely works. My sister has been using this cream regularly for a couple of weeks now, and she is quite pleased with this product.I bought this cream for Rs.490, and it got delivered to my house on time inside a well-sealed packet.I have abridged my review under the following points:POSITIVES:‚Ä¢ With regular use, this cream genuinely reduces hyperpigmentations of the skin (dark spots, old acne scars, sunburn, etc.).‚Ä¢ Being a non-comedogenic product, it doesn't block the pores of the skin and eventually prevents the formation of blackheads and acne.‚Ä¢ It contains Pterostilbene, an effective stilbenoid, enriched in antioxidant and has proven anti-inflammatory properties.‚Ä¢ This cream evens the skin tone and enhances the glow.‚Ä¢ It has a soothing musky fragrance.‚Ä¢ Both men and women can use this cream.NEGATIVES:‚Ä¢ The quantity of the cream (30 Gram) is not enough for a month's use. The manufacturer should market this product at least with a 50 Gram tube.DOSAGE:Apply twice daily for at least 6 - 8 Weeks.I would strongly recommend this product to my fellow shoppers. The price may seem slightly on the higher side, but it's worth the money.Happy shopping.

product_name: RE' EQUIL Skin Radiance Cream that helps in reducing hyper pigmentation, dark spots, age spots, melasma - 30g

product_name: Luxura Sciences African Raw Shea Butter Unrefined Organic Ivory for Skin and Body.(200 Gms) Body Mositurizer|| Anti-ageing|| Stretch Marks||SunScreen||Lip Cream.
review: Found a strand of hair right after I opened it (It's unrefined you see he he). On a serious note, did feel like returning it but these things are expected when it comes to products that are manufactured in cottage industries I guess. Promptly took the hair strand out and been using it for about 10 days now. It's extremely thick and rich, one needs to scrape it out as it solidifies at room temperature leading to a grainy texture. But once you take it on the palm and rub it, it melts without any effort making it easier to apply. I would probably not use it in the day as it is very rich, kinda oily and may get on clothes as it doesn't get absorbed completely (mind you, I've extremely dry skin). The scent is pretty mild and raw, nothing nasty. People who're used to synthetic/ processed scents might dislike this. Good news is, no more chemicals go on your skin which is the largest organ in your body. So, I made my own body butter at home following a DIY recipe and I loved the result. Planning to buy their Mango butter too and make some more body butter for my family and friends üôÇ which would make a nice gift this holiday season.P.S - Luxura Sciences, a lil more hygiene while handling and packaging the product please. Hence 3 stars, could've been a 5.

review: Using this product since quite few days and loving the result it has showed till now. I have dry skin which needs proper moisture otherwise white spots emerge and my skin looks dead. shea butter  hydrates my skin and gives a shine to my skin too. I apply this during day time also as it protects my skin from sun. You dont need to apply sunscreen after applying this. It does all the work. It just helps in eleminating all unwanted premature facial lines and wrinkles. These lines appear because we dont provide keep our skin hydrated and moisturised. For using it just rub a small amount of it into your palms untill melted and apply to desired or affected area of your body. It not only moisturises your skin but also heal it gradually and make it soft, supple and shiny. You can use it as a base for your DIY skin and hair care recipes. It's smell is really raw as it do not have any adulteration no external fragrance is used in it. But raw smell is not long lasting, it disappears real quick. Using it in this dry winter to safeguard my body and skin and I must say it really works amazingly.

review: I don't usually love skin care products but since my sister recommended  I have been using this.The product works amazing!!! This vitamin enriched cream provides broad spectrum UV protection SPF 30 in the cream that has helped protect my skin from the harmful UV and UVB rays of the sun. review: I ordered the product after going through all the positive reviews.. However, after opening the tube itself, I realized that the product is useless. It looks and smells like melted ice cream (that too cheap quality ice cream).. after putting on the face, it does not produce any foam (agree that is is just a scrub and not face wash, however it should feel a little creamy, but sadly it doesn't). All the claims about tan removal and cleansing seem to be false. I used it for a few days and then realized that it is useless, hence stopped using it. Now, it is just kept aside in the washroom, and probably will lie there for a year, before being thrown away.I believe, there are quite a few companies, which are producing cheap, worthless products and selling them on Amazon. This is definitely one of those products. Just wondering, how are they managing to get thousands of positive reviews.I never really write bad reviews, but this product is actually so bad that I had to write about it.

review: This moisturizer instantly brightens up the skin & deeply hydrates it while providing sun protection. It works like a BB cream + moisturizer + sunscreen in one. review: I use Olay products for years and recently started using Olay natural white light instant glowing fairness cream. As per the name instant fairness cream, gives instant glow after applying it. It claims to get the natural glow, but I didn't find glow on my face. I have fair skin and thus needs very less quantity of cream as I look whitish after using more quantity of cream. But I'm sure this cream will be perfect for people with darker skin tone. One more feature about the product is, it comes in travel-friendly packaging so it can be used while traveling as well. I liked this product and its value for money.

product_name: ST. D'VENCE Winter Edition Body Lotion with Tea Tree Oil and Shea Butter for Dry Skin
review: HI THEREI have a sensitive & a bit dry skin so very choosy in buying any beauty product.I have been using ST DVENCI winter edition moisturiser for the past several months now.I'm going to share my experience & personal  views on this product &of course that might vary from one customer to the other .BOTTLE PACKAGINGBottle looks neat & attractive with a pump.But, as many customers pointed out the last 40 ml of cream is below the pump & getting it out is nuisance & irritating.WHAT'S INSIDE THE BOTTLETea tree ,jojoba & vitamin E oill ,shea butter,  alovera are some of the main ingredients.The cream is thick, creamy and spreads real quick on the skin.No sticky / oily feel.The fragrance is extremely pleasant.WHEN TO USE?Ideally after bath when our skin is still moistIS IT EFFECTIVE?Personally for me very effective. My skin looks soft, supple & thoroughly hydrated. It nourishes my skin from deep inside.Real quality product.Many reviewers have written how this is ideal for winter & for dry skinned people.According to me this moisturiser is also extremely suitable for MATURE SKIN (above 38+) I'm 40+ & by far this is the ideal cream I have ever come across.ANY NEGATIVES?Apart from the pump that doesn't allow the last 40 mls of cream out,none.FINAL WORDThick ,fragrant cream. Easy to use.My skin simply responded very well to this product.One can feel how well it nourishes the skin with in 3 to 4 days of usage.300 ml botte lasts approximately 45 to 50 days .(moderate use)Would I recommend this if you are interested in buying? Most certainly yes! Would I buy again? Yep.In fact i have already purchased 3 bottles.REVIEW UPDATE ON 24.02.2020My fourth bottle has a pump that's lengthier than the previous ones. Now, the cream can be pumped almost fully. I would like to give full credit to the manufacturers for listening to the consumer's feedback, act & increase the length of the pump. A simple but very effective improvement. Well Done!One more thing-  this cream is no longer for very dry skin people but for dry skin. The difference is now, it doesn't give long hours of moisturizing effect like before.HOPE THIS REVIEW IS USEFUL TO YOU

product_name: Dove Cream Beauty Bathing Bar, 100g (Buy 4 Get 1 Free)
review: Over the years my skin has gone from very sensitive to very dry. I have tried so many different products to combat these problems and I always end up back at the dove. I love the soap bar because you get so much product for such a small price. They last ages and are easy to travel with.I never get a tight feeling after washing my body with this and I find it holds moisture better than other moisturizing body washes.As far as bar cleansers go, the Dove Beauty Cream Bar is the holy grail, a classic product that I have returned to over and over again throughout my life. The Dove Beauty Cream Bar is a great option for those with sensitive or dry skin. I have very dry eczema prone skin and this is always my go-to bar cleanser. I love the smell and texture and it always leaves my skin feeling clean, fresh and soft. For something so moisturising it lathers very well and doesn't leave any nasty residue on the skin. On the downside there are more moisturising products out there which may be necessary for those with super dry skin like me, the Dove Triple Moisturising Body Wash is actually a great option for those that need that little bit extra.---------PROS:---------- It's Dove.- It works wonders on sensitive skin.- It's cheaper on Amazon than from retail stores.---------CONS:---------- None that I can think of.__________________tl;dr: It's the soap you use when everything else doesn't work.

product_name: Dove Cream Beauty Bathing Bar, 100g (Buy 4 Get 1 Free)
review: Using Dove soap for years, just love it!- Great soap for oily combination skin.- A bit Moisturising, does not leaves skin dry as much as other soaps but you stillll need to moisturise with cream/oil.- A pack of 5 is much more affordable.- One soap goes upto for a month if one person uses it, rest depends on the use.- You can use dove soap to clean makeup brushes too, if you are finding an affordable option.- Classic original one is a good one, haven‚Äôt tried the other varieties.- Scent is mild and goes away shortly.Would definitely recommend it.

product_name: Dove Cream Beauty Bathing Bar, 100g (Buy 4 Get 1 Free)

review: I am truly amazed and content with some Re'equil¬Æ skincare products, and this 'Pitstop¬Æ Gel' is certainly one of those. With proper use, this ointment can repair woeful acne scars and pockmarks (pits) to a significant extent.I bagged this ointment/gel for Rs.590, and it got shipped to my place on time inside a well-sealed box.POSITIVES:‚Ä¢ It repairs the new and old acne scars (raised or pitted) to a satisfactory level. It may take time depending upon the severity and extent of the skin condition, but with regular use, you are most likely to witness positive results.‚Ä¢ It's a non-comedogenic product.‚Ä¢ It contains 'Liftonin¬Æ - Xpert', an essential ingredient that helps in the formation of new collagen fibres to repair pitted acne scars.‚Ä¢ Both men and women can use this gel.‚Ä¢ This product is free from harmful parabens, sulphates, silicones, and mineral oils.NEGATIVES:‚Ä¢ The cost of this product is slightly on the higher side.‚Ä¢ A '30 Gram tube' is going to be emptied within two to three weeks.DOSAGE:Apply it 3 - 4 times a day for at least two months for the new scars, and three to six months for the old ones.I would highly recommend this gel to other shoppers because of its sheer effectiveness. Though you are paying almost Rs.20 for a Gram of this product, it's worth the money.Happy shopping.
